justifications: Perhaps that was the thinking in British Airways' marketing offices after the pound plunged to a 31-year low following last week's Brexit vote.
British Airways is taking advantage of it, tweeting: Your dollar has never gone further, and with our amazing 3 day sale you can see even more of London!

The Brexit vote is causing real anxiety among many U.K. companies: The parent company of British Airways, as well as discount airline easyJet, both warned that their profits could take a hit this year.
Virgin Atlantic founder Sir Richard Branson, meanwhile, said he suspects that his Virgin Group holding company has lost a third in value since the vote.
It was unclear whether other U.K. airlines, like Virgin Atlantic, easyJet or Monarch would follow suit with their own Brexit-related promotions.
